**Security Report for Flask**

* Version: 3.1.3 (latest available on PyPI)

### GitHub Advisories
* [GHSA-68rp-wp8r-4726](https://github.com/pallets/flask/security/advisory/2022-GHSA-j9wq7c4kxjyvzg3m5tprhjkwx): Flask session does not add `Vary: Cookie` header when accessed in some ways.
